name: Pek's Adventure
description:
In this single-player RPG, you play as Pek. Your mom wakes you up on your sixteenth birthday and sends you to get a carrot. After exploring the town and finishing a few chores for her, goblins attack. You can then journey to meet the goblins and either defeat them or make peace with them, before finding out who the real enemy is...

Features

- A quick active-time battle system

- A move tutor system (no abilities are learned through leveling up)

- Multiple optional bosses based on choices and other gameplay

- Four endings and New Game+

Playtime: 1-2 hours
